name: 妖师
description:
"This is a strategic survival simulation game, a turn-based adventure game, and a light building game.

In the game, you will play as a spirit trainer who has the due to maintain the balance of the world. You will be staying in a sealed world with barely any people around and completing your daily routine is important. While you are producing, refining, and forging, you will encounter various disasters, monsters, and surprises from the outland merchants. Solve the crisis, stay alive, and seal all the humongous monsters or finish building the Monster Tower.

This is a strategic survival simulation game, a turn-based adventure game, and a light building game.

You will play as an ancient Spirit Trainer who has inherited the special talents.
Manage the energy, emotion, and hunger of the Spirit Trainer.
Farm and collect essential material for survival.
In the blueprint pool, explore hundreds of combat, survival, adventure, and interesting item combinations.
Use the basic materials acquired by farming to craft food and drugs.
Craft furniture, weapons, and equipment using materials like metal, wood, stone, and fabric.
Catch and tame the spirits (pets), so they will help you produce and battle.
Trade your extra resources for the things you need with traveling merchants.
Research and craft the ultimate equipment to restore the peace by heading to the four poles of the sealed world and sealing the grand monsters.
Maintain the balance between justice and evil (eliminate the evil force so there will always be more Light Energy than Dark Energy)
Stay alive in disasters like hurricane, rainstorm, snowstorm, and insect plague.
Explore scenes like grassland, desert, polluted land, and dungeon.
A new wild world is waiting for you to explore every time you spawn.
Relax in the game with the help from a smart and low-profile AI.
The tutorial included in the game will help you get started quickly.
In Challenge Mode, find a way to challenge the final holy beast and clear the game.
In Monster Tower Mode, enjoy a casual building experience and complete the Monster Tower to clear the game.
Survive
Farm and collect food materials. Cook your own food and stay alive.
Expand your farm and house, build your own home, and create more living space.
Prepare your resources for incoming disasters.
Select your items, leave your home, and explore the world.
Fight through dungeons, traps, plagues, and environmental illnesses, also, don’t forget the monster challenges that are everywhere.
Production & Crafting
Food, weapons, equipment, arcane devices, and special materials.
Control the AI to produce and craft. The features of the final products will be based on the blueprint you select. Who will claim the title of “Ultimate Blacksmith”?
Utilize your abilities and defeat the monsters using the tactical turn-based combat system (a traditional turn-based combat system with a speed setting that will decide when the character can move).
Use the incredible skills of weapons wisely, select the monster you want to attack, and turn the battle around in the blink of an eye.
Level up your characters through battles.
Exploration
Leave your home or travel with your spirits. Encounter special events, explore the dungeons, learn about the rumors, collect the treasures, and eliminate the monsters
Be prepared and enter the world of Elf Manor."
